function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding about the effect of building attributes on occupant health","Impact":"Ineffective design and operation of buildings that promote occupant health","Mitigation":"Education and training for building professionals, collaboration between health professionals and building practitioners","Technologies":"Health and building data analytics tools","People":"Building professionals, health professionals","Owner":"Building professionals, health professionals"},{"Description":"Absence of an effective collaboration framework between different stakeholders of a building","Impact":"Suboptimal incorporation of occupant health in building design and operation","Mitigation":"Establishment of collaboration frameworks, communication and coordination strategies","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, project management tools","People":"Building professionals, health professionals, data scientists","Owner":"Building professionals, health professionals, building owners"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns, reluctance to share data, and difficulty in defining quantitative metrics","Impact":"Hindrance in using data to enhance design and operation of healthy buildings","Mitigation":"Data privacy policies, incentives for data sharing, development of standardized health metrics","Technologies":"Privacy protection technologies, data sharing platforms, health metric analytics tools","People":"Building professionals, health professionals, data scientists","Owner":"Building professionals, health professionals"}]}
